sentences.en: Barking deliriously, the dog bounded towards his mistress.
sentences.cn: 那只狗兴奋地狂吠着向女主人跑去。

sentences.en: His concubine , Mistress Chen, was visiting with her old mother.
sentences.cn: 陈姨太也回到了她的年老的母亲那里.

sentences.en: I told her yes, I waited for my mistress.
sentences.cn: 我对她说“是”, 我在等候我的主人.

sentences.en: I will be calm; I will be mistress of myself.
sentences.cn: 我要镇定; 我要主宰自己.
你家女主人在家 吗 ?

sentences.en: It must be really bad, for her to ignore a summons from her mistress!
sentences.cn: 她居然不听女主人的使唤，实在是太不像话了！

sentences.en: My history mistress was extremely helpful.
sentences.cn: 教我历史的那位女老师特别乐于助人。

sentences.en: Oliver lingered no longer, but meekly followed his new mistress.
sentences.cn: 奥立弗不再迟疑, 乖乖地跟着他的新主人走去.

sentences.en: Rogue and mistress of Patterne do not go together.
sentences.cn: 罗格与帕忒恩的女主人不能并列.

sentences.en: She had always been mistress of her own destiny.
sentences.cn: 她总是能够掌握自己的命运。

sentences.en: She is a mistress of disguise.
The huge wolfhound danced in circles around his mistress.
sentences.cn: 这条大狼犬围着女主人蹦蹦跳跳地绕圈子。

sentences.en: The maid looked nervously at her mistress.
sentences.cn: 女仆紧张地看着女主人。

sentences.en: The maid wanted like anything to try on her mistress's clothes.
sentences.cn: 这位女仆很想把女主人的衣服穿起来试试看.

sentences.en: The Prince had shocked society by living openly with his mistress.
sentences.cn: 王子和他的情妇公开同居，让社会大为震惊。

sentences.en: We had a very good mathematics mistress who pulled me up.
sentences.cn: 我们有个很出色的女数学老师，她帮我提高了水平。

trans.tran_cn: 主妇，女主人，霸主，女统治者，情妇，<英>女教师
trans.tran_en: the female owner of a dog, horse etc
